questions.text: Which sentence is in the Present Perfect tense?
questions.explain: Present Perfect tense is formed with 'has/have' + past participle to describe an action that happened at an unspecified time before now.

questions.text: Identify the past participle of the verb 'to write'.
questions.explain: 'Written' is the past participle of 'to write', used in perfect tenses and passive voice.

title: L2 Introduction to Linguistics: Core Concepts Quiz

questions.text: What is the smallest unit of sound in a language?
questions.explain: A phoneme is the smallest unit of sound that can distinguish one word from another in a particular language.
